description: From picture +‎ -esque, a calque of Italian pittoresco, from pittura (“a picture, painting”).

adjectives.description: picturesque (comparative more picturesque, superlative most picturesque)

entries.meaning: Resembling or worthy of a picture or painting; having the qualities of a picture or painting; pleasingly beautiful.
examples: We looked down onto a beautiful, picturesque sunset over the ocean.

entries.meaning: Strikingly graphic or vivid; having striking and vivid imagery.
